headline: Justin's Expands its Portfolio of Organic Chocolate Treats with Candy Bars that Meet Consumer Demand for Mindful Options
summary: Justin's, a category leader known for crafting delicious, real-food products that contribute to the world in a positive and meaningful way, today is celebrating its newest confections innovation – Justin's® Peanut Caramel Nougat Chocolate Candy Bars – offering consumers a nostalgic, organic chocolate treat made with simple ingredients. The candy bars are USDA-certified organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, and will be available in two varieties, Dark Chocolate Peanut Caramel Nougat and Milk Choc

content.title: Justin's Expands its Portfolio of Organic Chocolate Treats with Candy Bars that Meet Consumer Demand for Mindful Options
content.summary: Justin's, a category leader known for crafting delicious, real-food products that contribute to the world in a positive and meaningful way, today is celebrating its newest confections innovation – Justin's® Peanut Caramel Nougat Chocolate Candy Bars – offering consumers a nostalgic, organic chocolate treat made with simple ingredients. The candy bars are USDA-certified organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, and will be available in two varieties, Dark Chocolate Peanut Caramel Nougat and Milk Choc

thumbnail.caption: NEW Justin’s® Peanut Caramel Nougat Chocolate Candy Bars offer consumers a simple swap for a nostalgic chocolate candy made with high-quality, mindfully-sourced ingredients. The new candy bars will hit shelves this summer at Sprouts Farmers Market, with additional retailers following throughout the year, including Whole Foods Market in August.
